CustomField.formula: "https://wa.me/" & IF ( Contains( MobilePhone , ' ' ), SUBSTITUTE( MobilePhone, " ", "" ) , IF ( Contains( MobilePhone , '+' ), SUBSTITUTE( MobilePhone, "+", "" ), IF ( Contains( MobilePhone , '-' ), SUBSTITUTE( MobilePhone, "-", "" ), IF ( Contains( MobilePhone , '(' ), SUBSTITUTE( MobilePhone, "(", "" ), IF ( Contains( MobilePhone , ')' ), SUBSTITUTE( MobilePhone, ")", "" ), MobilePhone)))))
CustomField.label: Whatsap Web Link
